page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = InsertColumn(Column as SQL::IndexColumnInfo [, InsertBefore as N = 1])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

argument.name: Column
argument.description: A SQL::IndexColumnInfo object and having (at a minimum) a value for the .name property.

argument.name: InsertBefore
argument.description: Optional. The index of the column before which the new column should be inserted.

page.discussion: The SQL::IndexInfo.InsertColumn() method adds a new column definition to a <SQL::IndexInfo> index definition.
page.example: dim IndexInfo as SQL::IndexInfo dim IndexColumn as SQL::IndexColumnInfo IndexInfo.Name = "Primary_Key" IndexInfo.PrimaryKey = .t. IndexColumn.Name = "MyColumnName" if .not. IndexInfo.AddColumn(IndexColumn) then ui_msg_box("Error", "Could not add index") end if IndexInfo.Name = "Lastname" IndexInfo.PrimaryKey = .f. IndexColumn.Name = "Lastname" if .not. IndexInfo.InsertColumn(IndexColumn, 1) then ui_msg_box("Error", "Could not insert index") end if ui_msg_box("Index Column Definition", IndexInfo.XML)
